#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;
long long int memo[10004][7][11],c;
long long int steps(long long int runs,long long int balls,long long int wickets)
{
    long long int i,sum;

    if(runs<=0)
        return 1;
        if(wickets<=0)
        return 1;
    if(balls<=0)
        return 1;

    if(memo[runs][balls][wickets]!=-1)
        return memo[runs][balls][wickets];
    sum=1;
    sum+=steps(runs,balls-1,wickets);
    sum+=steps(runs-1,balls-1,wickets);
    sum+=steps(runs-2,balls-1,wickets);
    sum+=steps(runs-3,balls-1,wickets);
    sum+=steps(runs-4,balls-1,wickets);
    sum+=steps(runs-6,balls-1,wickets);
    sum+=steps(runs-1,balls,wickets);
    sum+=steps(runs-2,balls,wickets);
    sum+=steps(runs-3,balls,wickets);
    sum+=steps(runs-5,balls,wickets);
    sum+=steps(runs-1,balls,wickets);
    sum+=steps(runs-2,balls,wickets);
    sum+=steps(runs-5,balls,wickets);
    sum+=steps(runs-7,balls,wickets);
    sum+=steps(runs,balls-1,wickets-1);
    sum=sum%c;
    memo[runs][balls][wickets]=sum;
    return sum;
}
int main()
{
    long long int sum,t,runs,i,k;
    cin>>t;
    c=10000007;
    memset(memo,-1,sizeof(memo));

    for(k=1;k<=t;k++)
    {
        cin>>runs;
          cout<<"Case "<<k<<": ";
            sum=steps(runs,6,6);
        cout<<sum%c<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
